name: Epic Streets (Nicolas Fernandez, DalmiroLunaD)
description:
Small demo game made by Team Groove for the Game Design course at Image Campus.

A roguelike beat 'em up mix (although due to lack of time there are few roguelike elements) that uses a unique system of interchangeable combo attacks, allowing the player to modify the order of their strikes to change how it affects enemies.

Made in a little over 100 hours throughout 7 weeks.
